hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo zypper up -y cat /etc/issue sudo zypper install -y tar make gcc curl wget unzip awk export WORK_DIR=`pwd`
#Install HAProxy wget http://www.haproxy.org/download/1.8/src/haproxy-1.8.3.tar.gz tar xzvf haproxy-1.8.3.tar.gz cd haproxy-1.8.3 make TARGET=linux26 sudo make install
cd $WORK_DIR #Install Nodejs wget http://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/systems/cloud/runtimes/nodejs/6.12.2.0/linux/s390x/ibm-6.12.2.0-node-v6.12.2-linux-s390x.bin chmod +x ibm-6.12.2.0-node-v6.12.2-linux-s390x.bin echo -e "LICENSE_ACCEPTED=TRUE\nUSER_INSTALL_DIR=$WORK_DIR/ibm/node\n-fileOverwrite_$WORK_DIR/ibm/node/_node_installation/uninstall.lax=Yes" > installer.properties cat installer.properties ./ibm-6.12.2.0-node-v6.12.2-linux-s390x.bin -f installer.properties -i silent
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:$WORK_DIR/ibm/node/bin
cd $WORK_DIR echo "var http = require('http');
function serve(ip, port) { http.createServer(function (req, res) { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'text/plain'}); res.write(JSON.stringify(req.headers)); res.end(\"\nThere's no place like \"+ip+\":\"+port+\"\n\"); }).listen(port, ip); console.log('Server running at http://'+ip+':'+port+'/'); }
// Create three servers for // the load balancer, listening on any // network on the following three ports serve('0.0.0.0', 9023); serve('0.0.0.0', 9024); serve('0.0.0.0', 9025);" > node.js
echo "global daemon maxconn 256
defaults mode http timeout connect 5000ms timeout client 50000ms timeout server 50000ms
frontend http-in bind *:8089 default_backend neo4j
backend neo4j mode http balance roundrobin option forwardfor http-request set-header X-Forwarded-Port %[dst_port] option httpchk HEAD / HTTP/1.1\r\nHost:localhost server s1 127.0.0.1:9023 maxconn 32 server s2 127.0.0.1:9024 maxconn 32 server s3 127.0.0.1:9025 maxconn 32
listen admin bind *:8080 stats enable" > haproxy.config
node node.js & #nohup node server.js & ls haproxy -f haproxy.config
curl 0.0.0.0:8089 curl 0.0.0.0:8089 curl 0.0.0.0:8089 curl 0.0.0.0:8089
haproxy -v | grep 1.8.3
